attributes.action: prevent Steiner schools and other experimental schools becoming state schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition to prevent the Creation of the Steiner school in Hertfordshire becoming a state funded school, along with other such experimental schools. There is no clear evidence they provide a better education than the existing state schools. The taxpayer should not be forced to pay for such schools and hence should remain private.
